sentences:
Alfred Jarry (; 8 September 1873 – 1 November 1907 ) was a French symbolist writer who is best known for his play Ubu Roi ( 1896 ) .
He also coined the term and philosophical concept of ' pataphysics .
Jarry was born in Laval , Mayenne , France , and his mother was from Brittany .
He was associated with the Symbolist movement .
His play Ubu Roi is often cited as a forerunner of Dada , and to the Surrealist and Futurist movements of the 1920s and 1930 .
Jarry wrote in a variety of hybrid genres and styles , prefiguring the postmodern .
He wrote plays , novels , poetry , essays and speculative journalism .
His texts are considered examples of absurdist literature and postmodern philosophy .
